sentences.sContent: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.sCn: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.sContent: students who run up huge debts
...who are prevented from ever fully paying their debt to society...
...A new study out of Ohio State University found that young adults are accumulating credit card debt at a more rapid rate than other age groups...
...Promotional literature for colleges and student loans often speaks of debt as an investment in yourself...
...Many people are borrowing on credit cards so heavily that payoff rates at these levels are not sufficient to recover their credit card debt by the end of their life...
...and the amount of student- loan debt carried by households has increased more than five times since 1999...
...But there's a growing body of evidence suggesting that today's young adults are also drowning in credit-card debt-and that many of them will take this debt to their graves...
...there might be funds available to reduce the national debt and pay for education...

phrases.pCn: 债务还本付息；借款服务处

remMethod.val: “贷的” → 因债务向银行贷款 → 债

trans.tranOther: a sum of money that a person or organization owes
